/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is flanked by modern buildings, their glass and steel facades reflecting the clear blue sky above. Trees line the sides of the road, adding a touch of green to the urban landscape. Cars and buses fill the road, indicating a busy time of day. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of scale to the scene. The overall color palette is dominated by shades of blue, green, and gray, reflecting both the natural and man-made elements of the cityscape.
